author: Kevin Scholla, Kevin Scholla
title: XFL 2020: New League Poised for a Comeback Despite Virus Shutdown
description: When the announcement came two years ago that the XFL would be up and running in 2020, many were excited about the prospect of having an alternative to NFL football. After years of ridiculous rule changes, Vick, Kaepernick, and the very unlikable Roger Goodel…
